      Slider SkatoloBase.addSlider(String theName)
      Adds a default slider with a default width of 100 and height of 10. the default value range is from 0-100.

    • Uses of Slider in tech.lity.rea.skatolo.gui.controllers

      Methods in tech.lity.rea.skatolo.gui.controllers that return Slider 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Slider Slider.linebreak()
      Slider Slider.scrolled(int theRotationValue)
      changes the value of the slider when hovering and using the mouse wheel or the scroll function of a multi-touch track pad.
      Slider Slider.setColorTickMark(int theColor)
      sets the color of tick marks if enabled. by default the color is set to white.
      Slider Slider.setHandleSize(int theSize)
      sets the size of the Slider handle, by default it is set to either the width or height of the slider.
      Slider Slider.setHeight(int theValue)
      set the height of the slider.
      Slider Slider.setMax(float theValue)
      set the maximum value of the slider.
      Slider Slider.setMin(float theValue)
      sets the minimum value of the slider.
      Slider Slider.setNumberOfTickMarks(int theNumber)
      sets the number of tickmarks for a slider, by default tick marks are turned off.
      Slider Slider.setRange(float theMin, float theMax) 
      Slider Slider.setScrollSensitivity(float theValue)
      sets the sensitivity for the scroll behavior when using the mouse wheel or the scroll function of a multi-touch track pad.
      Slider Slider.setSensitivity(float theValue)
      Deprecated. 
      Slider Slider.setSize(int theWidth, int theHeight) 
      Slider Slider.setSliderMode(int theMode)
      use the slider mode to set the mode of the slider bar, which can be Slider.FLEXIBLE or Slider.FIX
      protected Slider Slider.setTickMarks() 
      Slider Slider.setTriggerEvent(int theEventID)
      the trigger event is set to Slider.PRESSED by default but can be changed to Slider.RELEASE so that events are triggered when the slider is released.
      Slider Slider.setValue(float theValue)
      set the value of the slider.
      Slider Slider.setWidth(int theValue)
      set the width of the slider.
      Slider Slider.showTickMarks(boolean theFlag)
      shows or hides tickmarks for a slider
      Slider Slider.shuffle()
      assigns a random value to the slider.
      Slider Slider.snapToTickMarks(boolean theFlag)
      enables or disables snap to tick marks.
      protected Slider Slider.snapValue(float theValue) 
      Slider Slider.update() 
      Slider Slider.updateDisplayMode(int theMode)
      Slider Slider.updateInternalEvents(processing.core.PApplet theApplet)
